name: Miner Shard

abilities.Yield: 3-10% chance to drop 1 extra ore from mines

description: A mining-focused rune that enhances luck, ore yield, mining speed, and mining power.

name: Frost Speck

abilities.Ice: Freezes enemies for a short duration. Has a small chance to trigger and a short cooldown

description: A frost rune that can freeze enemies, currently unobtainable in-game.

name: Flame Spark

abilities.Burn: Deals 5-10% of weapon damage as fire per second for 1-2 seconds. 15-25% chance on hit

obtainment: Deathaxe Skeleton, Elite Deathaxe Skeleton, Blazing Slime, Reaper
description: A fire rune that inflicts burning damage over time on hit.

name: Venom Crumb

abilities.Poison: Deals 4-7% of weapon damage as poison per second for 3-6 seconds. 25-35% chance on hit

description: A poison rune that inflicts toxic damage over an extended duration.

name: Chill Dust

abilities.Snow: Slows enemy movement and attack speed

description: A cold rune that slows enemies, currently unobtainable in-game.

name: Blast Chip

abilities.Explosion: Causes an explosion at location of victim, dealing 20-40% of weapon damage as AOE damage. 8-20% chance on hit

description: An explosive rune that creates area-of-effect damage on hit.

name: Drain Edge

abilities.Heal: Heal 5-13% of physical damage dealt on-hit

description: A lifesteal rune that heals the user based on damage dealt.

name: Briar Notch

abilities.Thorns: Reflect 2-10% physical damage taken. Maximum damage given limits at 5% max health of user. 0.05 seconds cooldown

description: A defensive rune that reflects damage back to attackers.

name: Rage Mark

abilities.Berserk: Boosts physical damage and movement speed by 12-26% for 4-7 seconds. Has 50-60 seconds cooldown. Activates when health is below 35%

description: A berserker rune that triggers when low on health, boosting damage and speed.

name: Ward Patch

abilities.Shield: Reduces incoming damage by 6-14% with a 5-15% chance per hit

description: A defensive rune that has a chance to reduce incoming damage.

name: Rot Stitch

abilities.Toxic Veins: Deals poison damage around the user while health is below 35%

description: A poison aura rune that activates when low on health, currently unobtainable.
